title: Take a look at the OnePlus 13 in all its glory
description: The OnePlus 13 will be unveiled before the end of this month, after Qualcomm introduces the Snapdragon 8 Elite on Monday. That SoC will power the new OnePlus flagship of course, and if you've been wondering what the phone will look like, wonder no more. Today three different images depicting it have been leaked in China (the last one showing it next to the Oppo Find X8). So we can, for the first time, gawk at the new design, which isn't entirely removed from what we've seen in the OnePlus 12, but has some differences anyway. excerpt: Leaked images are upon us. The OnePlus 13 will be unveiled before the end of this month, after Qualcomm introduces the Snapdragon 8 Elite on Monday. That...
text: The OnePlus 13 will be unveiled before the end of this month, after Qualcomm introduces the Snapdragon 8 Elite on Monday. That SoC will power the new OnePlus flagship of course, and if you've been wondering what the phone will look like, wonder no more. Today three different images depicting it have been leaked in China (the last one showing it next to the Oppo Find X8). So we can, for the first time, gawk at the new design, which isn't entirely removed from what we've seen in the OnePlus 12, but has some differences anyway. OnePlus 13 leaked images The camera island loses its connection to the phone's frame, and now is just a circle on the left part of the back. The Hasselblad logo has been moved out of the island and now occupies the space to its right, above a decorative metal strip. The 50 MP main camera uses the Sony Lytia LYT-808 sensor, the ultrawide goes with Samsung's ISOCELL JN1, while the 3x zoom periscope telephoto camera has a Sony Lytia LYT-600 sensor. The OnePlus 13 will have a lot of memory, a huge battery, and support for magnetic wireless charging. Source 1 (in Chinese) | Source 2 (in Chinese) | Via
html:
The OnePlus 13 will be unveiled before the end of this month, after Qualcomm introduces the Snapdragon 8 Elite on Monday. That SoC will power the new OnePlus flagship of course, and if you've been wondering what the phone will look like, wonder no more. Today three different images depicting it have been leaked in China (the last one showing it next to the Oppo Find X8). So we can, for the first time, gawk at the new design, which isn't entirely removed from what we've seen in the OnePlus 12, but has some differences anyway.


OnePlus 13 leaked images

The camera island loses its connection to the phone's frame, and now is just a circle on the left part of the back. The Hasselblad logo has been moved out of the island and now occupies the space to its right, above a decorative metal strip.

The 50 MP main camera uses the Sony Lytia LYT-808 sensor, the ultrawide goes with Samsung's ISOCELL JN1, while the 3x zoom periscope telephoto camera has a Sony Lytia LYT-600 sensor. The OnePlus 13 will have a lot of memory, a huge battery, and support for magnetic wireless charging.

Source 1 (in Chinese) | Source 2 (in Chinese) | Via
